name: Roller-Ball
description:
2 PLAYER RUNNER GAME

FIGHT FOR THE ORB BY DASHING INTO YOUR OPPONENT

ENTER THE PORTAL TO INCREASE YOUR SCORE

You play 2 cyborgs rolling on theskyscrappers, trying to steal the orb from eachother and win points by putting the ball in the portal!

Keys : 

start : SPACE

player 1 : WASD and LEFT SHIFT

player 2 : ARROWS and RIGHT SHIFT

(Use right and left shift to dash in order to steal the ball from the other player)

Coding by :

Etienne Boisson, Bastien Bernath, Xavier Theimer-Lienhard.

Background, Animation and Sound by :

Alexandre Tettoni, Louise Rieupouilh.

Game created for the Orbital Game Jam 2023 with the theme cyberpunk and race !

Using : Procreate, Aseprite, Garage Band, and Unity
